actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to provide for a mid-decade census of population, unemployment, and housing in the year 1975 and every 10 years thereafter.

summary.text: Provides for a mid-decade census of population, unemployment, and housing in the year 1975 and every ten years thereafter. Establishes April 1 as the census date. (Adds 13 U.S.C. 141(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to provide for a mid-decade census of population, unemployment, and housing in the year 1975 and every 10 years thereafter.
